title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: SAML SSO: Updated note about IdP certificate expiration, recommending updates before expiry and clarifying GitHub's handling of expired certificates.
Push Protection: Added link to bypass requests documentation in delegated bypass section.
Repository Filtering: Revised introduction for clarity and conciseness in repository table filtering guide.
summary:
- SAML SSO: Updated note about IdP certificate expiration, recommending updates before expiry and clarifying GitHub's handling of expired certificates.
- Push Protection: Added link to bypass requests documentation in delegated bypass section.
- Repository Filtering: Revised introduction for clarity and conciseness in repository table filtering guide.
- Dependabot: Documented

**fef1120**: [EDI] About delegated bypass for push protection (#59356) (by mc)

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- SAML SSO: Updated note about IdP certificate expiration, recommending updates before expiry and clarifying GitHub's handling of expired certificates.
- Push Protection: Added link to bypass requests documentation in delegated bypass section.
- Repository Filtering: Revised introduction for clarity and conciseness in repository table filtering guide.
- Dependabot: Documented
